message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I think it will be very valuable for you, and this is a competitive price.
I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $11,000 is a bit too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product.
